subject: Prioritize TODO items with effort estimates
body:
High priority (low effort, high value):
- Save/load designs to localStorage
- Restore image position sliders

Medium priority:
- Looks define per-element text styling
- More overlay types

Low priority (long-term):
- TypeScript migration
- Unit tests
